attributes.action: Get the DVLA to give Tom Burnell his driving license back!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition has been started to help Tom Burnell reclaim his driving license after the DVLA revoked it on Saturday for no apparent reason. This lad has recovered from a brain tumour and took his test again. He had been driving for 3 years with a clean license and he has no health issues now. So lets all fight to help him get his license back as this is totally unfair!

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
